sentences.en: Her skirt hangs in perfect wide pleats.
sentences.cn: 她的裙子打着漂亮的宽褶自然下垂。

sentences.en: I can pleat complete fracture is when the bone comes a part apart.
sentences.cn: 完全性骨折是指骨头完全分离.

sentences.en: I like a pleat in the front.
Now we're going to pleat the backside.
sentences.cn: 现在我们将要开始制作背后的褶.

sentences.en: The basis and principle of application of image technique to the garment pleat evaluation were studied.
sentences.cn: 分析了服装褶皱的形成方法和穿着后所产生的视觉效果,提出了从服装表面提取褶皱图像的方法.

sentences.en: To pleat or gather ( fabric ) into a ruffle.
sentences.cn: 给(织物)打褶裥,给 ( 织物 ) 饰褶边.

sentences.en: You can pleat palm fronds to make huts, umbrellas and baskets.
sentences.cn: 人们可以把棕榈叶折叠起来盖棚屋, 制伞,编篮子.

trans.tran_en: a flat narrow fold in a skirt, a pair of trousers, a dress etc
